xwikidoc.name: FeedbackMetadataClassSheet
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: FeedbackMetadataClassSheet
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}}## #if($xcontext.getDisplayMode() == "view" || $xcontext.action == "view") #set($feedbackMetadataObj = $doc.getObject('FeedbackFormCode.FeedbackMetadataClass'))## {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}## Feedback Metadata:
Reporter: {{/html}}## $doc.display('reporter', $feedbackMetadataObj)## {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}
Page URL: {{/html}}## $doc.display('url', $feedbackMetadataObj)## {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}
Recipients: {{/html}}## $doc.display('recipients', $feedbackMetadataObj)## {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}
Referrer: {{/html}}## $doc.display('referrer', $feedbackMetadataObj)## {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}
User Agent: {{/html}}## $doc.display('userAgent', $feedbackMetadataObj)## {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}
Screen resolution: {{/html}}## $doc.display('screenResolution', $feedbackMetadataObj)## {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}
Feedback type: {{/html}}## #set($type = $feedbackMetadataObj.get('type')) [[$xwiki.getDocument($type).getValue("type")>>$type]]## {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}
{{/html}} #end {{/velocity}}
